data.title: A giant leap into aviation at London Biggin Hill Airport’s Futures Week
data.meta_description: BBGA Association Limited A giant leap into aviation at London Biggin Hill Airport’s Futures Week
data.text:
London Biggin Hill Airport celebrates another successful Futures Week, a bi-annual event aimed at inspiring the next generation into a career in aviation and aerospace.

Hosted by the airport, Futures Week welcomed a group of 15 students aged 15-18 years, to learn about the aviation and aerospace industries and experience the career paths available at the airport and beyond.

The next Futures Week will take place in February 2024 and applications will open in December. To learn more, visit www.bigginhillairport.com/early-careers

Students cheer after an engaging visit to the airport’s Rescue & Firefighting service.

Students learn more about a career in the Rescue and Firefighting department.

Students pose in front of a fire truck with Fire and Rescue gear on (middle).

ENDS

High-resolution images and interviews are available.

For more information, please contact 8020 Communications.

Julia Farish / Laura Davies

Telephone: +44 (0)1483 447380

E-Mail: bigginhill@8020comms.com

About London Biggin Hill Airport

London Biggin Hill Airport is located 12 miles from central London and offers award-winning VIP handling, a choice of FBOs, extensive hangarage, support and maintenance services for all ranges of business jets.

A designated UK Port of Entry, Biggin Hill is free of runway slot constraints. An exclusive six-minute helicopter transfer service to and from the heart of London makes it the fastest transfer of any London airport.

Biggin Hill is the only dedicated business aviation airport within the capital and is already home to more than 70 resident aviation businesses.

There are very few places in the world other than London Biggin Hill where aircraft operators and support companies can conduct all aspects of their business operations, management and maintenance at the heart of a global city and with the confidence in their ability to expand and develop over time.
